about.description: Senior Software engineer at Amazon, in my 10 years of experience I've been working on the following subjects:

opensource.name: EchoVault
opensource.description: A productivity-enhancing macOS app that captures, transcribes and archives your daily tasks and interactions. Harness the power of LLMs to review, analyze, and gain insights from your recorded content.

opensource.name: flipper
opensource.description: A desktop debugging platform for mobile developers. I contributed on the iOS side, helping on getting it published to Cocoapods and building the shared preferences plugin on iOS. Currently working on the memory leak plugin on iOS

opensource.name: dependencyswapper
opensource.description: The best way to swap Cocoapods dependencies between source/development and non-source frameworks

opensource.name: Umbrella Header Linter
opensource.description: The Linter for Umbrella Headers on iOS/watchOS/macOS/tvOS Frameworks.

software.name: BloodHound
software.description: HTTP Monitoring and mocking tool that captures traffic between its host application and the internet.

software.name: App Performance Monitoring
software.description: A framework to monitor application loading time and view loading times.

software.name: Web Infrastructure
software.description: Web Infrastructure written on top WKWebView that supports a plugin architecture(Interceptors) for customization. It also provides a built-in JavaScript infrastructure around promises to allow developers to easily create JavaScript plugins that interact with native code

software.name: Network Infrastructure
software.description: A networking framework for iOS, tvOS and watchOS built on top of NSURLSession that takes care of encryption, serialization, etc... Supports SSLPinning, interception based on plugin and architecture and mocking

software.name: Factory
software.description: An IoC Container that supports constructor and property based Dependency Injection. All our Infrastructure is built around Factory

software.name: Application/Framework Template
software.description: A template to help developers get started building applications/frameworks on iOS. It configures the CI, build settings based on language(Swift/Objc), provides obfuscation scripts and provides a basic sample application that wires to our infrastructure

software.name: Automation of iOS Infrastructure's CI
software.description: Developers only need to focus on coding. This work included from bootstrapping a project to setting the CI, to generate binaries, publish the artifacts and podspecs to a private repository, etc..

software.name: Contextual Menu
software.description: A UI Framework that provided APIs to construct contextual menus which contained app-global and view-specfic menu items

software.name: Repository
software.description: Framework for fetching data on demand, it allows the consumer to easily track the states of the data. It does it by implementing the repository pattern in a reactive programming style(RxSwift). The repository mediates between the data access layer and the domain layer, providing abstractions of common data access facilities such as REST invocations and in-memory/disk caching.
